product_name: Coleman Skin Smart Insect Repellent Pen Spray - 0.5 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep the Coleman Skin Smart(TM) insect repellent pen spray clipped to a pocket for easy access while hiking in mosquito territory. DEET-free formula is effective against mosquitoes and ticks for up to 8 hrs.; active ingredient is IR3535(R). Pen spray features a Combo-Clip(TM) that lets you attach the container to a lanyard or key ring (sold separately), or clip it to a pocket or pack strap. Formula dries quickly and is odorless and non-sticky. Pump spray ensures easy application. Pen provides approximately 220 sprays.
short_description: Keep the Coleman Skin Smart(TM) insect repellent pen spray clipped to a pocket for easy access while hiking in mosquito territory.
